description: It is "all but certain" the Manx border will stay closed to non-residents in December, the chief minister says.
title: Isle of Man closed border 'will ensure Covid-free Christmas'
title_page: Isle of Man closed border 'will ensure Covid-free Christmas' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Quayle said the decision would cause some "unease", but there was "a clear collective will in our community to maintain the status quo and keep the virus from spreading across our island this December".
